definition: Living Buddha/title of Mongolian Lamas from 17th century

sentences.english: Dedicated specifically for the preservation of the remains of the Living Buddha Stupa.
sentences.chinese: 靈塔，專門用於保存活佛遺體的佛塔。

sentences.english: Gongjue living Buddha promised to tell him after the Buddhist rituals.
sentences.chinese: 貢覺活佛答應忙完了法事就找他。

sentences.english: Gongjue living buddha has accompanied them to waterside.
sentences.chinese: 貢覺活佛一直把他們送到水邊。

sentences.english: Zen master had a faithful but very naive student who regarded him as a living buddha.
sentences.chinese: 有位禪師有個很虔誠卻天真的弟子，視他爲活佛。

sentences.english: I couldn't talk to the Living Buddha, who only spoke Tibetian.
sentences.chinese: 可惜我不能與活佛對話，因爲他只說藏語。

sentences.english: The news that living Buddha has come got abroad in this small village.
sentences.chinese: 活佛來了的消息在這個小村莊傳開了。

sentences.english: After five when called no condition, please return living buddhas.
sentences.chinese: 此後五當召再也沒有條件請回活佛了。

sentences.english: Therefore, Gongjue living Buddha is going to make a prayer wheel here.
sentences.chinese: 因此貢覺活佛要在這裏做一個轉經筒。

sentences.english: In 1992 the Religious Affairs Bureau of the State Council approved the succession of the 17th Karmapa Living Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 宗教事務局批准了第十七世噶瑪巴活佛的繼任。

sentences.english: They covered up the treasure bottle of Gongjue living Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 把貢覺活佛給他們的寶瓶埋在裏面。

sentences.english: There are other mahasiddha also to living Buddha did the relevant certification and granted to remember.
sentences.chinese: 還有其他的大成就者也對活佛做了相關的認證和授記。

sentences.english: Herdsmen come to see Gongjue living Buddha incessantly.
sentences.chinese: 牧民們還是接連不斷地來找貢覺活佛。

sentences.english: I have learned that for many of them, the Dalai Lama is the earthly manifestation of the living Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 我得知，對他們許多人來說，達賴喇嘛是活佛轉世。

sentences.english: Reincarnation of 5th Living Buddha Dezhub selected.
sentences.chinese: 第五世德珠活佛轉世靈童被選舉出來。

sentences.english: The Living Buddha reincarnation system, unique to Tibetan Buddhism, is fully respected.
sentences.chinese: 藏傳佛教特有的活佛轉世的傳承方式得到充分尊重。

sentences.english: Little Buddha Vajra Buddhaholy has quickly been found.
sentences.chinese: 金剛佛聖小活佛被迅速地尋獲。

definition: lama, spiritual teacher in Tibetan Buddhism
Panchen (Lama)/abbr. for 班禪額爾德尼|班禅额尔德尼[Ban1 chan2 E2 er3 de2 ni2]
the Dalai Lama/abbr. of 達賴喇嘛|达赖喇嘛[Da2 lai4 La3 ma5]
Tsongkhapa (1357-1419), Tibetan religious leader, founder of the Gelugpa school 格魯派|格鲁派[Ge2 lu3 pai4]
Geju (Tibetan: transmit word of Buddha) sect of Tibetan Buddhist
Panchen Erdeni or Panchen Lama/abbr. to 班禪|班禅[Ban1 chan2]
pinyin: Ban1 chan2 E2 er3 de2 ni2
